Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: What the Nagus wants, we acquire.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: ST video game: Star Trek Online

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Once you have their money... you never give it back.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 episode: "The Nagus", PRD episode: "First Con-tact"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: The best deal is the one that brings the most profit.
Money is everything.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: ST - Strange New Worlds 9 short story: "The Last Tree on Ferenginar: A Ferengi Fable From the Future"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never spend more for an acquisition than you have to.
Sedition and treason are always profitable.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: ST video game: Star Trek Online

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Always exaggerate your estimates.
Never allow family law stand in the way of opportunity.
Keep your ears open.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 episode: "In the Hands of the Prophets"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Small print leads to large risk.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 reference: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Opportunity plus instinct equals profit.
Greed is eternal.
Anything worth doing is worth doing for money.
Sometimes the quickest way to find profits is to let them find you.
Dead men close no deals.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Demons of Air and Darkness (DS9 novel)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: A deal is a deal... until a better one comes along.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: A contract is a contract is a contract... but only between Ferengi
A Ferengi without profit is no Ferengi at all.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 episode: "Heart of Stone", DS9 - The Dog of War comic: "Issue 3"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Satisfaction is not guaranteed.
He who dives under the table today lives to profit tomorrow.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Ferenginar: Satisfaction is Not Guaranteed (DS9 novella)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never place friendship above profit.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 episode: "Rules of Acquisition", PRD episode: "First Con-tact"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: A wise man can hear profit in the wind.
Nothing is more important than your health... except for your money.
There's nothing more dangerous than an honest businessman.
What's in it for me?
"Confidentiality equals profit."
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 - The Badlands novel: Part IV

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never make fun of a Ferengi's mother. Insult something he cares about instead.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 episode: "The Siege", Elite Force II

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: It never hurts to suck up to the boss.
War is good for business.
Peace is good for business.
The early investor reaps the most interest.
Don't tell customers more than they need to know.
She can touch your lobes but never your latinum.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Profit is its own reward.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Feed your greed, but not enough to choke it.
Never confuse wisdom with luck.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Expand or die.
Don't trust a man wearing a better suit than your own.
The bigger the smile, the sharper the knife.
Never ask when you can take.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never trust anybody taller than you.
Rate divided by time equals profit. (Also known as "The Velocity of Wealth.")
Take joy from profit, and profit from joy.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Worlds of Deep Space Nine: Bajor: Fragments and Omens (DS9 novel)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Good customers are as rare as latinumâ€”treasure them.
There is no substitute for success.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Free advice is seldom cheap.
Keep your lies consistent.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: The riskier the road, the greater the profit.
Work is the best therapy-at least for your employees.
Win or lose, there's always Hupyrian beetle snuff
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Someone's always got bigger ears.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: What Happens Now (Star Trek: The Last Generation #3, TNG comic)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Risk doesn't always equal reward.
Ferengi are not responsible for the stupidity of other races.
Knowledge equals profit.
Home is where the heart is... but the stars are made of latinum.
Every once in a while, declare peace. It confuses the hell out of your enemies.
If you break it, I'll charge you for it!
Beware of the Vulcan greed for knowledge.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: The flimsier the product, the higher the price.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never let the competition know what you're thinking.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Learn the customer's weaknesses, so that you can better take advantage of him.
It ain't over 'til its over.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Ferenginar: Satisfaction is Not Guaranteed (DS9 novella)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Vengeance will cost you everything.
Ask not what your profits can do for you, but what you can do for your profits.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: [It is] better to lose some profit and live than lose all profit and die.
Your boss is only worth what he pays you.
There are many paths to profit.
Females and finances don't mix.
Expand or die.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Legends of the Ferengi (DS9 novel), VOY episode: "False Profits"

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Enough... is never enough.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Every man has his price.
If you can't take it with you, don't go.
Trust is the biggest liability of all.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: When it's good for business, tell the truth.
Profit trumps emotion.
Nature decays, but latinum lasts forever.
Sleep can interfere with opportunity.
Faith moves mountains... of inventory.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: There is no honor in poverty.
Hope doesn't keep the lights on.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: A woman wearing clothes is like a man without any profits.
Dignity and an empty sack is worth the sack.
Exploitation begins at home.
Treat people in your debt like family... exploit them.
Never have sex with the boss' sister.
Always have sex with the boss.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: You can't free a fish from water.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Everything is for sale, even friendship.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never Sleep with the bosses sister
Even a blind man can recognize the glow of Latinum.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: You can't make a deal if you're dead.
Listen to secrets, but never repeat them.
Wives serve, brothers inherit.
Only fools pay retail.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: There's nothing wrong with charity... as long as it winds up in your pocket.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: People love the bartender.
Even when you're a customer, sell yourself.
Sell the sizzle, not the steak.
Even in the worst of times someone turns a profit.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book), DS9 video game: Harbinger

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Whisper your way to success.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: "Treachery, Faith, and the Great River" (DS9 episode)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Know your enemies... but do business with them always.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Not even dishonesty can tarnish the shine of profit.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: When life hands you ungaberries, make detergent.
A Ferengi waits to bid until his opponents have exhausted themselves.
Not even dishonesty can tarnish the shine of profit.
Let others keep their reputation. You keep their money.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Hear all, trust nothing.
Never cheat a Klingon... unless you're sure you can get away with it.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Trouble comes in threes.
It's never too late to fire the staff.
It's always good business to know about new customers before they walk in your door.
Location, location, location.
A Ferengi chooses no side but his own.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: (DS9 novel: Ferenginar: Satisfaction is Not Guaranteed)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: The justification for profit is profit.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: New customers are like razor-toothed gree worms. They can be succulent, but sometimes they bite back.
A Tribble Always Means Customer Satisfaction
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Adventures RPG: Tribble Player Character Supplement

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Sometimes, the only thing more dangerous than a question is an answer.
Employees are the rungs on the ladder of success. Don't hesitate to step on them.
A good lie is easier to believe than the truth.
Never begin a (business) negotiation on an empty stomach.
Never gamble with a telepath.
Always know what you're buying.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: You can't free a fish from water.
Sometimes what you get free costs entirely too much.
Possession is eleven-tenths of the law!
Beware the man who doesn't take time for Oo-mox.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: If that's what's written, then that's what's written.
Latinum lasts longer than lust.
Duck; death is tall.
You can't buy fate.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never be afraid to mislabel a product.
Time, like latinum, is a highly limited commodity.
More is good... all is better.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Always leave yourself an out.
The definition of insanity is trying the same failed scheme & expecting different results
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: Department of Temporal Investigations 3: Shield of the Gods (novel) pg 11

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: A wife is luxury... a smart accountant a neccessity.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: When the messenger comes to appropriate your profits, kill the messenger.
A wealthy man can afford anything except a conscience.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Never allow doubt to tarnish your lust for latinum.
When in doubt, lie.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: If you believe it, they believe it.
Always inspect the merchandise before making a deal.
If it ain't broke, don't fix it.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: DS9 novel: Ferenginar: Satisfaction is Not Guaranteed

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: Deep down, everyone's a Ferengi.
Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Source: The Ferengi Rules of Acquisition (DS9 reference book)

Ferengi_Rules_of_Acquisition.Rule: No good deed ever goes unpunished.
When Morn leaves, it's all over.
Always get somebody else to do the lifting.
Never get into anything that you can't get out of.
A man is only worth the sum of his possessions.
An angry man is an enemy, and a satisfied man is an ally.
The less employees know about the cash flow, the smaller the share they can demand.
Only a fool passes up a business opportunity.
The more time they take deciding, the more money they will spend.
A bargain usually isn't.
Whenever you exploit someone, it never hurts to thank them...That way it's easier to exploit them the next time.
When the shooting starts, let the mercenaries handle it!
